context: This powerful scripture: Everything is possible for one who believes, is a great reminder for you and everyone in your home that there really is nothing holding you back if you truly believe. ‚ù§Ô∏è
Jesus said to him, "If you can believe, Everything is possible for one who believes"Jesus never told us to try to understand but simply believe.

Jesus said to him, "If you can believe, everything is possible for one who believes.." Trust Jesus! Have faith in Him. And you will receive a miracle. Amen! Join our online prayer ministry, that will be held Day/Date: Thursday, June 15th, 2022

"If you can't?" said Jesus. "Everything is possible for one who believes" This is the story of a child who has a dumb Spirit, the day the Spirit met Jesus was the last day he tormented the child. Come to Jesus with your problems, He has the solution

God wants to hear from you! He's calling for you. There is nothing to hard for God to save, fix, solve, promote, bless, increase, expose, change, etc. Just activate your faith. Everything is possible for one who believes.

Jesus said, "Everything is possible for one who believes." If you could only believe that with God all things are possible, all things would be possible for you. This is hope for the day. The impossible is possible for them that believe

Do you need a miracle? Call upon the name of Jesus and trust in Him fully. He is the Waymaker and the Miracle Worker. üòçüôèüåå And Jesus said to him, "If you can believe, Everything is possible for one who believes."

Jesus said to him, "If you can believe, Everything is possible for one who believes." Take note of the last word "believes"; meaning it continues; you don't have to stop believing, hold on till it manifests.

"Jesus said unto him, If thou canst believe,Everything is possible for one who believes." GOD'S HAND IS UPON YOU MY LIL FRIEND. FATHER HEAL THIS PUPS ILLNESS & MAKE HIM WELL SO HE MAY PLAY AGAIN.. IN JESUS NAME AMEN

always True. Before your faith can make everything possible for you, you must first believe in the One who makes everything possible, JESUS! üòç üòç Jesus said unto him, If thou canst believe, Everything is possible for one who believes
There are two ways to live: You can live as if nothing is a miracle; you can live as if everything is a miracle. -Jesus said: Everything is possible for one who believes.

Visualize. Believe. Achieve!! Faith is a recurring theme in the Bible, encouraging belief and trust in God to achieve victories, because you can everything with God. Remember: "Everything is possible for one who believes."
'If you can?' said Jesus. Everything is possible for one who believes. #God #Believe #Breakthrough The key thing is that you must believe.

Everything is possible for one who believes. Our faith in God enables us to operate in the realm of unlimited possibilities. Through unwavering belief, we tap into God's limitless power and witness extraordinary outcomes. #FaithInGod #NothingIsImpossible
Jesus said to him, "If you can believe, Everything is possible for one who believes." Be a possibility thinker because you serve the God of unlimited possibilities!

Jesus said to him,[You say to Me] "If You can? Everything is possible for one who believes and trusts [in Me]!"Underline the word "Every". Anything which u desire According to his Will is possible, if only you can trust him completely.

"Everything is possible for one who believes." I think we believe less because we don't know God as the God of all flesh. If we know that He is God of all flesh then we will also know that there is nothing that is impossible with God. God does immeasurably more than we can ever imagine. He makes all things possible. However we also need to do our part for us to receive the impossible. It takes active faith which requires us to trust God totally with everything.
don't lose faith laddy! And Jesus said to him, "If You can?"Everything is possible for one who believes"

Everything is possible for one who believes. Our unwavering faith in God empowers us to embrace boundless opportunities. By firmly trusting in the divine, we unlock the inexhaustible strength of God, witnessing remarkable results beyond imagination.

"If you can'?" said Jesus. "Everything is possible for one who believes." Whenever you are in doubt, remember that God is on your side no matter what. Believe in Him and that He has your best interest at heart, He will never let you down.

"Everything is possible for one who believes"! Your lack of faith!! It is the one that does not allow you to "see the living God" who created the cosmos and everything that exists in it. peace to your soul. He can everything, really everything.

Jesus said to him," If You can?' Everything is possible for one who believes." God wants to do more in you & through you than you can imagine. Nothing is impossible when you put your faith in Him. When you pray in faith, God answers. Walk & pray with faith in Christ.

Dear heavenly father: gospel is your final goal to bless the whole world, please let us understand your mind, what should Jesus do?we might small, but nothing is impossible, "If you can'?" said Jesus. "Everything is possible for one who believes."

You have to put your faith in Jesus.. do you believe Jesus is the healer? Do you believe He is God? The Bible says in Mark:"Jesus said unto him, If thou canst believe, everything is possible for one who believes." That's true. He can everything.

Everything is possible for one who believes. That means a better future, dreams, hopes, promotions, jobs, financials, safety, relationships, your giving, your love for God. Why settle for compromise when u can have the best when you activate your faith in God

If you believe the DOUBTS in your mind, you won't achieve the DREAMS in your heart! ‚úãüåå 7 words that can change your THINKING & change your LIFE (if you believe): üòç "EVERYTHING is POSSIBLE for one who BELIEVES!"Everything means everything!
If you're crazy enough to believe in it, God is FAITHFUL enough to DO IT!! What do you mean, "If I can'?" Jesus asked. "Everything is possible for one who believes"

Jesus said to him, "If you can believe, everything is possible for one who believes." Believing in God is one step away from God's possibilities. God will honour your faith in him simply because you believe in him.
